TextView.android:text: Passive: Grants the wearer 25 ability power every 5 seconds.
After each spellcast, the wearer's mana is set to 20.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30 ability power for the rest of combat.
Passive: Reduces the attack speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 35% for 0.5 seconds. Can only equip one of this item.
Passive: Grants 10 bonus attack damage and 10 ability power. Basic attacks and abilities heal for 10% of the damage dealt.At the start of each round, one of these buffs is increased to 33(%).
Passive: Every 5 seconds, the wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 18% missing health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds.
Passive: Basic attacks restore an additional 8 mana on-attack.
Passive: Every third basic attack from the wearer deals 70 magic damage to the target and 3 additional targets, while also reducing their magic resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.
